parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.description: Select at least one workspace that contains classification and labeling data

parameters.name: Region
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where SourceRegion != ""
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SourceRegion
| project SourceRegion

content.json:
#### Value to Customers

It provides enterprises with:
- A data discovery solution using automated scanning technology for sensitivity and malware
- A unified view of the data estate with risk insights across their multi-cloud assets
- A consolidated threat protection experience for data within Microsoft Defender for Cloud

#### Definitions
- For a Storage account, an asset refers to the file or blob stored in the account.
- For Amazon S3, an asset refers to the object stored in the bucket.

#### Known Limitations
- The data shown in this workbook is based on logs generated from scans done in the past. To get the current state of scanning for your resources, view the Information protection dashboard.
- The resource count and status from the Information Protection dashboard might not match the data shown in the workbook.

content.query:
let ResourcebyRegion = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where SourceType contains "Azure"
| extend ResourceType = iff(SourceType=="AzureBlob", "Storage account", "Amazon S3")
| summarize arg_max( AssetLastScanTime, *) by AssetPath, ActivityType
| distinct SourcePath, SourceRegion
| summarize AssetCount = count() by SourceRegion;

ResourcebyRegion
content.title: Resource region

content.query:
let SensitivityLabels = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where SourceType contains "Azure"
| extend newSensitivityLabel = iff(SensitivityLabel[0] == "", "No Label", SensitivityLabel[0])
| summarize arg_max(newSensitivityLabel, SourceType, FileSize) by AssetPath 
| summarize AssetCount = count() by newSensitivityLabel
| top 4 by AssetCount;


SensitivityLabels
content.title: Top sensitivity labels found

content.query:
let Classifications = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where SourceType contains "Azure"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, FileSize, AssetType) by AssetPath 
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| summarize AssetCount = count() by Classification
| project Classification, AssetCount
| top 4 by AssetCount;

Classifications
content.title: Top classifications found

content.noDataMessage: Scan AWS resources to populate query. If no AWS resources located in data estate, delete this query.

content.title: Top classifications found
content.noDataMessage: Scan AWS resources to populate query. If no AWS resources located in data estate, delete this query.

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ClassificationCount > 0
| project logTime = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yy-MM-dd'), SourceType
| summarize ClassifiedAssetCount = count() by logTime, SourceType

PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where Classification != "[]"
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| extend ResourceType = iff(SourceType=="AzureBlob", "Storage accounts", "Amazon S3")
| summarize ClassifiedAssetCount = count() by DateClassified = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), ResourceType
content.title: Classification events logged

content.json:
### Classification events
- A classification event is generated when an asset is scanned, and non-zero classifications are found. 
- With incremental scans, a classification event is generated only if the asset has been modified from the last scan. 
- If the same asset is scanned multiple times over a period of time, then multiple classification events will be logged within Log Analytics. 

##### The number of classification events shown here may exceed the total number of assets in the resource.

### Asset Classification Drilldown

- Use the table on the left to filter the table on the right. 
- The table on the left shows the classifications and unique asset count. 
- The table on the right shows the assets that contain the selected classification.

content.query:
let Classifications = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, FileSize, AssetType) by AssetPath 
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| summarize AssetCount = count() by Classification
| project Classification, AssetCount;

Classifications

let ClassificationCountColumn = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| summarize arg_max( AssetLastScanTime, *) by AssetPath, ActivityType
| mv-expand Classification
| summarize ClassificationCount= count(todynamic(Classification)) by AssetPath;
let ClassificationsDrilldown = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| where Classification != ""
| where "{UserSelectedClassification:label}" == "All" or Classification contains "{UserSelectedClassification:label}";

ClassificationsDrilldown | join ClassificationCountColumn on AssetPath
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, ClassificationDetails, SourceScanId) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetLastScanTime, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, ClassificationDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId;

ClassificationsDrilldown

PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling"
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| where SensitivityLabel != "[]"
| extend ResourceType = iff(SourceType=="AzureBlob", "Storage accounts", "Amazon S3")
| summarize LabeledAssetCount = count() by DateClassified = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), ResourceType
content.title: Sensitivity labeling events logged

content.json:
### Labeling events
- A labeling event is generated when an asset is scanned, and the classifications found match the auto-labeling rules in the tenant. 
- With incremental scans, a labeling event is generated only if the asset has been modified from the last scan. 
- If the same asset is scanned multiple times over a period of time, then multiple labeling events will be logged within Log Analytics. 

##### The number of labeling events shown here may exceed the total number of assets in the resource.

### Sensitivity Labels Drilldown

- Use the table on the left to filter the table on the right. 
- The table on the left shows the classifications and unique asset count. 
- The table on the right shows the assets that contain the selected classification.

content.query:
let SensitivityLabels = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| extend newSensitivityLabel = iff(SensitivityLabel[0] == "", "No Label", SensitivityLabel[0])
| summarize arg_max(newSensitivityLabel, SourceType, FileSize) by AssetPath 
| summarize AssetCount = count() by newSensitivityLabel
| sort by AssetCount;

SensitivityLabels
content.title: Sensitivity Labels

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| extend SensitivityLabel = iff(SensitivityLabel[0] == "", "No Label", SensitivityLabel[0])
| where "{UserSelectedLabel:label}" == "All" or "{UserSelectedLabel:label}" == SensitivityLabel
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceScanId) by AssetPath
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetLastScanTime, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId
| sort by AssetLastScanTime desc
content.title: Sensitivity Labels Drilldown- Asset Level

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| join (PurviewScanStatusLogs
    | where OperationName == "StatusChangeNotification"
    | where ScanTotalRunTimeInSeconds != 0)
    on $left.SourceScanId == $right.ScanResultId
| project TimeGenerated, SourceScanId, ResultType, SourceName, SourceType, SourceRegion, SourcePath, AssetsDiscovered, AssetsClassified, ScanQueueTimeInSeconds, ScanTotalRunTimeInSeconds
| summarize count() by TimeGenerated, ResultType
content.title: Scan Status

content.query:
PurviewScanStatusLogs
    | where ResultType in ("Succeeded","Failed")
    | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated,3h), ResultType
content.title: Scan Status

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| join (PurviewScanStatusLogs
    | where ResultType == "Succeeded"
    | extend ResourceType = iff(DataSourceType=="AzureStorage", "Storage account", DataSourceType))
    on $left.SourceScanId == $right.ScanResultId
| project TimeGenerated, SourcePath, SourceName, ResourceType, SourceRegion, ResultType, SourceScanId, AssetsDiscovered, AssetsClassified, ScanTotalRunTimeInSeconds
content.title: Successful scanned resources

content.query:
PurviewScanStatusLogs
    | where ResultType == "Failed"
    | extend ResourceType = iff(DataSourceType=="AzureStorage", "Storage account", DataSourceType)
    | extend error = parse_json(ErrorDetails)
    | project TimeGenerated, DataSourceName, ResourceType, ResultType, ScanResultId, error.Message, ScanQueueTimeInSeconds, ScanTotalRunTimeInSeconds
content.title: Resources with scanning issues

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where SourceType contains "Azure"
| summarize arg_max(AssetPath, SourcePath, FileExtension) by AssetPath 
| summarize count() by FileExtension
| sort by count_ desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 File Extensions

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where SourceType contains "Azure"
| summarize arg_max(AssetPath, SourcePath, FileExtension) by AssetPath 
| summarize count() by FileExtension
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: File Extensions

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| summarize by SourceName
| project SourceName

parameters.name: Classification
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, FileSize, AssetType) by AssetPath 
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| summarize by Classification
| project Classification

parameters.name: Label
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling"
| mv-expand SensitivityLabel to typeof(string)
| where SensitivityLabel != ""
| summarize by SensitivityLabel
| project SensitivityLabel

parameters.name: PurviewAccount
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| summarize by PurviewAccountName
| project PurviewAccountName

parameters.name: LastScanTime
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where AssetLastScanTime != ""
| extend formattedLastScanTime = format_datetime(AssetLastScanTime, 'M/d/yyyy')
| summarize by formattedLastScanTime
| project formattedLastScanTime

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| summarize by SourceSubscriptionId
| project SourceSubscriptionId

content.json:
### Asset search

- Use the table below to find specific assets within all the data that has been scanned and logged.
- Click on the **Asset Name** to see the details
- Click on the **Source Path** to go to the resource (applicable only for Azure resources)

content.query:
let classifiedAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| extend LastScanTime = format_datetime(AssetLastScanTime, 'M/d/yyyy')
| where "{LastScanTime:label}" == "Any one" or "{LastScanTime:label}" == LastScanTime
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{Subscription:label}" == "All" or SourceSubscriptionId in~ (split("{Subscription:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| where "{Resource:label}" == "All" or SourceName in (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Classification:label}" == "All" or Classification contains "{Classification:label}"
| extend AssetLastScanTime = format_datetime(AssetLastScanTime, 'M/d/yyyy')
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationDetails, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationDetails, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId;

let labeledAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling"  
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where "{Region:label}" == "All" or SourceRegion in~ (split("{Region:label}", ", "))
| extend CloudProvider = iff((SourceName contains "Azure"), "Azure", "Amazon Web Services")
| where CloudProvider in (split("{CloudProvider:label}", ", "))
| where "{Resource:label}" == "All" or SourceName in (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{Subscription:label}" == "All" or SourceSubscriptionId in~ (split("{Subscription:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand SensitivityLabel to typeof(string)
| mv-expand SensitivityLabelDetails to typeof(string)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, SensitivityLabel, SourceType, SensitivityLabelDetails, SensitivityLabelTrigger) by AssetPath
| project AssetPath, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SensitivityLabelTrigger;

let table = labeledAssets
| join kind= fullouter classifiedAssets on AssetPath
| extend Classification = iff((Classification == "[]"), "No Classifications", Classification)
| where "{Label:label}" == "All" or (split("{Label:label}", ", ")) contains SensitivityLabel
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetLastScanTime, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationDetails, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId;

table
content.title: Asset Drilldown
